Material used.Material Name: Differentiated SH-SY5Y cells overexpressing WT or A53T alpha-synuclein
Material used.Description: Mitochondrial proteins from SH-SY5Y cells overexpressing wild-type (WT) or A53T mutant alpha-synuclein were compared to control cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression levels were compared using 2D-DIGE, with significant changes observed in A53T-expressing cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and independent t-tests were used for statistical analysis.

Material used.Material Name: Differentiated SH-SY5Y cells overexpressing WT or A53T alpha-synuclein
Material used.Description: Specific mitochondrial protein levels were validated using Western blot analysis.

Readout description.Result Description: Western blot confirmed changes in mitochondrial protein expression in A53T-expressing cells.
